def l(s):
    s = s[-1]+s[:-1]
    s = s.lstrip('0')
    return s
 
def r(s):
    s = s[1:]+s[0]
    s = s.lstrip('0')
    return s
 
t = int(raw_input())
while t :
    t=t-1
    n = raw_input()
    ans = max(int(l(r(n))),int(r(l(n))))
    temp = n[:]
    for i in range(len(n)) :
        temp = l(temp)
        ans = max(ans,int(temp))
    temp = n[:]
    for i in range(len(n)) :
        temp = r(temp)
        ans = max(ans,int(temp))
    print ans
